title: Belmont Filmhouse Cafe Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Soups are always vegan. Other vegan choices are available; ask wait staff. Also can make other dishes vegan. A movie theater/cafe/bar in a stylish, relaxed location situated in the basement of a building built in 1896. All food is made-in-house and is fresh and imaginative. Free Wi-Fi in the bar.
